articles.title: No evidence suggests people with COVID-19 antibodies protected from secondary infection: WHO - 中国日报
articles.description: There is currently no evidence that people who have recovered from COVID-19 and have antibodies are protected from a second infection, the World Health Organization (WHO) said in a daily situation report on Saturday.
